title: Bound by Danger
description: She was never supposed to go and fall in love. Quinn Satori has been keeping secrets. Big ones. As a memory weaver, the mind has always been her playground, the truth whatever she needed people to believe. After years of being the one holding all the cards, she never expected her gift would come back to haunt her in the form of Finley St. Aubyn. Hunky British billionaire. Immortal Guardian. Giant pain in her ass. With eyes that promise pleasure, a deliciously filthy mouth, and a body made for sin, he’s also the only man she can’t forget. One incredible night, that’s all it was supposed to be. She never planned on catching feelings. Or for him to show up years later and dredge it all back up. The worst part? He doesn’t remember any of it…thanks to her.When a special assignment goes awry leaving them trapped without backup, the only way to save their lives is for Quinn to come clean. Unfortunately, doing so may cost her the only thing she’s ever wanted. Him.People say the truth will set you free but for Quinn and Finley, it just may be the one thing that keeps them bound. Bound by Danger is a standalone novel set in the Undercover Magic world and takes place immediately following the events of Call of Danger. Warning, this book contains a dirty-talking Brit with a need for control and an alpha female who’s finally met her match. Keep your fire extinguisher handy because these two are liable to combust.
author: Meg Anne
